TEXT.TITLE: AMERICAN ELECTRIC <AEP> UNIT TO REDEEM PREFERRED
TEXT.BODY: American Electric Power Co's Ohio Power Co subsidiary said that on June 1 it will redeem 40,000 of its 177,760 shares of Series A 14 pct cumulative preferred shares at par value of 100 dlrs per share. Reuter
